channel.title: nintendo on Tobyblog
channel.description: Recent content in nintendo on Tobyblog

item.title: We Play Mario Party 10
item.description: The kids and I play Mario Party 10, the most inexplicably hated Mario Party of them all!

item.title: We Play Wii Play Playthrough
item.description: TheVCubeSolver and I team up in this playthrough vid to reintroduce you to a seriously underrated classic on the Wii.

item.title: Conversations Series: The Nintendo NX
item.description: Join TheVCubeSolver and I as we discuss the recently announced NX project from Nintendo, a new and novel system that could be the successor to the beleaguered Wii U. But what exactly is it? For the moment, all we can do is guess. But I think we have some good ideas.
